mapper.select: Select ALLBANK_BKNO from ALLBANK WHERE ALLBANK_RMFORWARD= '1' AND ALLBANK_BRNO = '000'

select
from RMOUT where RMOUT_SENDDATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND SUBSTR(RMOUT_SENDER_BANK,1,3)= #{senderBank,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY RMOUT_SENDTIME DESC,RMOUT_FEPNO DESC,RMOUT_BRNO DESC, RMOUT_ORIGINAL DESC,RMOUT_FISCSNO DESC FETCH FIRST #{topNumber,jdbcType=CHAR} ROWS ONLY

select
from RMOUT where RMOUT_SENDDATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND SUBSTR(RMOUT_SENDER_BANK,1,3)= #{senderBank,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY RMOUT_SENDTIME DESC,RMOUT_FEPNO DESC,RMOUT_BRNO DESC, RMOUT_ORIGINAL DESC,RMOUT_FISCSNO DESC,RMOUT_SENDTIME DESC,RMOUT_FISCSNO DESC FETCH FIRST #{topNumber,jdbcType=CHAR} ROWS ONLY

#{stat}
